reuters.title: KROGER <KR> SAYS UNION REJECTS CONTRACT
reuters.body: Kroger Co's King Soopers Supermarkets unit said employees, members of the United Food and Commercial Workers Union, rejected its latest contract proposal by a 58 pct to 42 pct margin. The company said employees have been on strike since May 8, but it has kept the stores open and fully staffed. Reuter 
